nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping

Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping.Group
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RandomAccessGroup

    public abstract class Group
extends java.lang.Object
    A group of results, with its group identity and the results themselves. You can only iterate over the Hit objects. The subclass RandomAccessGroup does allow random access to the hits.
